#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
char s[1001];
int main()
{
	
	int t,i,j;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int count=0,flag=0;
		cin>>s;
		for(i=0,j=strlen(s)-1;i<=j;i++,j--)
		{
			if(s[i]!=s[j])
			count++;
			if(count>1)
			{
				flag=1;
				break;
			}
			
		}
		if(flag)
		cout<<"no\n";
		else
		cout<<"yes\n";
		
	}
}
